title: Stellantis India to hike vehicle prices by up to Rs 17,000 from April 30
description: Under the Citroen brand, the company sells a range of vehicles, including compact car C3, SUVs C3 Aircross and C5 Aircross and electric car E-C3 priced from Rs 6.16 lakh to Rs 37.67 lakh, as per the company's website.
